name: Fashion Show Makeover Mega Pack
description:
A mega dress up / makeover game where you can create outfits and looks for glam fashion models - with a colossal selection of 3200 clothing items, facial feature variants and accessories.

Click on the item category icons on the left (e.g. "dresses") - a huge scrollable list or table of items of that category will appear on the right. To take off an item, click its icon again or just click on the item on the doll.

After you've done customizing the outfit for the model, you can grab a screenshot of it with the "Camera" button.

The game launches full-screen by default, but you can press Alt+Enter (on Windows) and then resize the window as you like.
